banner.title: IT Services
banner.subtitle: Empowering the future through technology education and training

it.description: Our IT department offers comprehensive training programs designed to equip individuals with modern technical skills. From web development to software engineering, we provide quality education that prepares students for successful careers in technology.

courses.title: Web Development
courses.description: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React and Next.js to build professional websites.

courses.title: Software Engineering
courses.description: Comprehensive training in software development, algorithms, and software design patterns.

courses.title: Mobile App Development
courses.description: Create Android and iOS applications using modern development frameworks.

courses.title: Database Management
courses.description: Master SQL and NoSQL databases, data modeling, and database administration.

it.summerCamp: Special intensive training program for students during summer break with hands-on coding projects, robotics workshops, and digital skills development.

medical.description: Our medical center provides accessible, affordable healthcare services with experienced professionals and modern facilities.

services.title: General Consultation
services.description: Comprehensive health checkups with qualified physicians

services.title: Diagnostic Services
services.description: Laboratory tests and medical imaging facilities

education.description: Various educational programs and support services to promote learning and academic excellence.

programs.title: Tutoring Services
programs.description: One-on-one and group tutoring for various subjects

programs.title: Adult Education
programs.description: Literacy programs and skill development for adults

programs.title: Library Services
programs.description: Books, digital resources, and study spaces

sports.description: World-class facilities for various sports and fitness activities promoting physical health and community engagement.

facilities.title: Football Field
facilities.description: Full-size field for matches and training

facilities.title: Cricket Grounds
facilities.description: Well-maintained grounds for matches and practice

banquets.description: Elegant spaces for weddings, conferences, and social gatherings with professional event management.
